name: Lamb Won Tons
recipeIngredient: 34 won ton skins, 3 inches by 31/4 inches

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the lamb, coriander, cinnamon, salt, pepper, raisins and pistachios until well combined. Brush the edges of 1 won ton skin with water. Place 1 1/2 teaspoons of the filling in the center. Bring the 4 corners of the skin together over the filling and press the edges together to seal tightly. Repeat.

Working in batches, deep-fry the won tons until nicely browned. The oil should not get hotter than 360 degrees, or the skins will brown before the filling is cooked. Drain on paper towels and serve hot.
